info.abstract:
[Type] Flow control.
[Behaviour] Stop the execution of a running workflow.
[Parameters] - id : identifier of the workflow to be stopped.
[System parameters] - objkey_filter : filter on the output of the operator written to file (default=all => no filter, none => no output). service : show result data as text.
[Examples] Cancel the workflow 1: OPH_TERM: oph_cancel id=1; SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_cancel;id=1;"
